text: https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=36804 added support for namespaces to the echoxml task and was included in revision 688091, which was first released in 1.8. http://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/echoxml.html correctly states that echoxml was added in 1.7, but doesn't state that the "namespacePolicy" attribute was added in 1.8.
